name: Piscifun Flame Spinning Reels, Lightweight 9+1BB Ultra Smooth Spinning Fishing Reels, 19.8LBs Max Drag, 2000, 3000, 4000, 5000 Series, Red & Blue
short_description: Lightweight and Portable: Weighing only 6.1oz, the Flame spinning reel is perfect for anglers who enjoy fishing trips. Its relatively narrow hollow graphite body and lightweight reel gears make it easy to carry and use

Powerful Performance: With an incredible drag power of up to 19.8lbs, the Piscifun Flame fishing reel is designed to help you fight with the giants. Its reinforced metal main shaft, high-quality drive gear, precisely machined brass pinion gear, and triple drag washers ensure that you have the power you need to reel in big fish

Stylish Design: The Flame spinning fishing reel boasts a sleek matte black body with a red aluminum spool, giving it a modern and sharp appearance. Its unique hollow body, X shape spool, and personalized handle make it stand out from the crowd

Smooth Operation: The Flame spinning reel features 9 quality ball bearings plus one roller bearing, which, when paired with precision gears engagement, provide a buttery smooth performance. The 2000 and 3000 series reels are perfect for freshwater fishing, while the 4000 and 5000 series reels are ideal for chasing big fish

Unique & Innovative: Smooth positive click drag, high density EVA knob. This feature makes the Flame an excellent value reel, and Piscifun is committed to providing the most cost-effective fishing tackle for anglers

name: KastKing Megatron Spinning Reel, Freshwater and Saltwater Spinning Fishing Reel, Rigid Aluminum Frame 7+1 Double-Shielded Stainless-Steel BB, Over 30 lbs. Carbon Drag, CNC Aluminum Spool & Handle
short_description: MOST POWERFUL TRANSFORMER IN FISHING – KastKing MegaTron transforms the industry with the roll out of another great freshwater and saltwater fishing reel. The MegaTron spinning reel brings you a unique, geometrical, bionic engineering design. A spinning reel of this rugged build and unique optics deserves a special place in your fishing tackle arsenal. Its precise geometric forms offer a distinct autobot look that set it apart from all others and helps reduce weight while maintaining strength.

RIGID ALUMINUM SKELETAL FRAME - The KastKing MegaTron spin fishing reel is built for enormous strength and endless durability. The MegaTron aerospace aluminum alloy skeletal design frame is more than a great look! It’s the basis for its strength to battle hard fighting fish in fresh and saltwater. With its matrix of leadership KastKing rolls out this series of affordable metal body reels and sends a shock wave through the industry. KastKing MegaTron transforms you into the angler you want to be.

PRO LEVEL QUALITY GEARS – MegaTron spinning reels provide maximum performance and strength for all tournament anglers looking for victory. The main drive gear is made of durable zinc alloy matched with a pinion gear machined from solid brass. Both deliver rigidity and smoothness needed in building reels ready to tackle tough conditions. MegaTron spinning reels feature a CNC machined T6061 aerospace aluminum alloy spool and exclusive design robot inspired aluminum handles.

MORE POWER – KastKing MegaTron spinning reels are waiting for you to handle the biggest fish. Every MegaTron fishing reel features an exceptionally smooth carbon fiber drag system that delivers over 30 lbs. of impressive run-stopping power. Making MegaTron a perfect big game spinning reel. The triple-disc carbon fiber drag delivers consistently strong and flawless drag without start-up hesitation that can result in snapped fishing lines and lost fish.

FLUID PERFORMANCE - You will be amazed at the dynamics and faultless mechanics of KastKing MegaTron spinning reels. Each reel features 7+1 MaxiDur double-shielded stainless-steel ball bearings. The instant anti-reverse provides for quick hooksets. Double-shielded stainless ball bearings mean the MegaTron will perform equally in saltwater fishing and freshwater fishing, they are like a fishing robots in disguise! Fish with peace of mind.

【Powerful & Steady】The Carbon X II delivers up to a powerful 22 lbs of carbon fiber drag. A Reinforced stainless steel main shaft, upgraded Carbon Fiber Resistance System with new technology improves the drag performance by 15%.

【Key Components】The Carbon X II features the latest gear cutting technology increasing the smoothness and durability. The CNC machined direct drive screw-in aluminum handle is lighter and stronger, with EVA handle it gives you a comfort feel in hand.

【Multiple Retrieves】The Piscifun Carbon X II features a lightning fast 6.2:1 gear ratio as well as a buttery smooth 5.2:1. These 2 gear ratios are the perfect combination, the high speed retrieve helps anglers battle the strong, fast runs of the biggest fish and the moderate speed is perfect for finessing in your next trophy.

【Silky Smooth】Each Carbon X II Fishing reel features 10+1 double sealed imported stainless steel bearings. You will be amazed at the incredible smooth operation. Take the Carbon X II to battle and come out victorious!

name: Pflueger President Spinning Fishing Reel
short_description: PERFORMANCE MEETS VALUE: Pflueger President spinning reels combine smooth operation with a price that won't break the bank. With a balanced mix of performance, quality, and value, this reel is "The Smart Choice."

SIZE 20 SPINNING REEL: Features a graphite body and rotor, for lightweight, corrosion-resistant fishing reels. The aluminum handle and soft touch rubber knob are suitable for Right/Left handed anglers.

RECOVER 20.2" | 51cm for every turn of the crank. Slow oscillation gearing and a Total Line Control system reduces twists, wind knots and provides greater control over all lines. Gear ratio of 5.2:1. Features an Aluminum spool.

SEALED OIL FELT FRONT DRAG with a max drag of 6lb | 2.7kg to help tire out the fish, so you can reel in the catch. The 7 ball bearing system plus Instant Anti-Reverse ensures smooth operation for any fishing experience.

LINE CAPACITY: Mono Capacity yd/lb: 200/2 100/4 80/6. Braid Capacity yd/lb: 180/4 125/6 100/8. The aluminum braid-ready spool is ready to be fished with all types of line, including monofilaments, fluorocarbons and braids.
product_description: The Pflueger President Spinning Reel series offers a balanced mix of performance, quality and value. It’s “The Smart Choice” for anglers who want smooth operation at a price that won’t break the bank. This reliable and well-balanced reel allows you to cast and retrieve with relative ease, so you can always keep your line in the water to maximize every moment. Pflueger products are world famous for their innovation, dependability, and attention to detail. Pflueger continues to combine pride in craftsmanship and commitment to new technology to create a line of superior fishing products. Simply put, Pflueger Products Perform. That's why we're the smart choice among anglers who are looking for products that will lead to their next catch.

name: KastKing Kestrel SE Spinning Fishing Reel, 5oz Ultralight SFS Spinning Reel, High Strength Sycron Construction, 7+1 MaxDur Double Shielded BB, Aerodynamic Reel Rotor, 13.2 Lbs Max Drag
short_description: Elite Spinning Reel for Finesse Fishing: The Kestrel SE spinning reel weighs just 5 ounces, making it ideal for anglers who prefer downsized bait presentations in clear or highly pressured waters. Despite its ultralight design, it delivers strong, reliable performance for targeting even the wariest fish. Its indigo-to-starlight blue gradient finish subtly shifts with light, giving each reel a mesmerizing, celestial-inspired look.

High-Strength Sycron Construction: Key load-bearing areas of the spinning reel, including the reel body and reel foot, are reinforced with Sycron material to reduce flex and wobble under heavy load. Tensile strength is increased by 28%, compressive strength by 12%, and impact resistance by 40% compared to graphite material, while remaining 15% lighter for improved balance and reduced fatigue.

Ingenuity Design for Smoothness: The Kestrel SE Spinning Reel redefines casting with its patented spool design, minimizing line friction for extended casting distances and superior control. This innovation, coupled with a 7+1 MaxiDur double shielded stainless steel ball bearings system, guarantees smooth, reliable operation in diverse environments. Plus, the aerodynamic reel rotor lowers resistance and provides better overall performance.

Premium Components: The Kestrel SE spinning reel combines finesse with strength, featuring double sliding stabilizer rods (D.S.S.R.), a zinc alloy main gear, a manganese brass pinion gear, and an AT6 super-hard aluminum main shaft. Its 5.2:1 gear ratio and up to 13.2 lbs of drag let you confidently fish with light lines without worrying about breakoffs.

Enhanced Performance and Comfort: Ergonomic TPE handle knob delivers a secure grip and precise control. The direct-drive secure-fit CNC aluminum handle locks in solid with zero play for maximum stability. Sealed CNC anodized aluminum spool featuring a waterproof O-ring front drag reduces moisture intrusion to help prevent drag slip.

short_description: Powerful Performance: With a reinforced stainless steel main shaft and Zinc alloy drive gear, the Piscifun Viper X spinning reel can handle up to 33lbs of max drag, making it perfect for both saltwater and freshwater fishing
Smooth and Consistent: Equipped with double shielded 10+1 stainless steel bearings, the Viper X spinning reel provides silky smooth performance that's both reliable and consistent

Lighter & Stronger: Based on high quality graphite material, new mould technology was applied for the Viper X fish reel on frame and rotor. This makes the Viper X spinning reels lighter and more stylish while ensuring the overall strength

Versatile Retrieval: Featuring a buttery smooth 5.2:1 gear ratio in our 500, 1000 series and a lightning-fast 6.2:1 gear ratio in our 2000-5000 series, the Viper X spinning reel offers multiple retrieves to suit any fishing style or situation.

Waterproof Design: Thanks to innovative waterproof technology, including a one-way clutch bushing, one-way clutch plate, stainless steel washer, and shielded stainless steel bearing, the Viper X spinning reel is highly resistant to water and dirt, ensuring optimal performance in any conditions

Premium Quality at an Affordable Price: From the high-density EVA knob to the CNC machined braid-ready spool and exquisite plating accessories, every detail of the Piscifun Viper X spinning reel is designed to deliver premium quality at an unbeatable price
